title: 'Major incident' declared in Kent as thousands without water across South East England
description: Residents in Tunbridge Wells, Maidstone and Canterbury are among those who have been hit by cuts to their water supply. Here is what you need to know.
content:
Tens of thousands of people across South East England are without water, as Kent County Council (KCC) declared a major incident.
South East Water (SEW) blamed the outages on Storm Goretti and cold weather causing burst pipes and power cuts.

title: New campaign urges Starmer not to diminish legal rights of Send children
description: Backed by actor Sally Phillips and MPs across parties, group raises concerns about overhaul of provision in England
content:
Keir Starmer is being urged not to diminish the legal rights of children with special educational needs by a new national campaign backed by the actor Sally Phillips and a cross-party group of Labour, Liberal Democrat and Conservative MPs.
